channel.title: redjade_hu tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from redjade_hu.

item.description: @RokinRobin @ggreenwald @Trevornoah glad to hear, but it is still system failure that it took this long. But sure, the system worked in the end LOL. glad you feel good about that.
@MMinnym45 @ggreenwald @Trevornoah I understand but we will see. I was referring to the past, years and years of waiting for something to be done and never was (perhaps until now).

@birbigs @Trevornoah @Trevornoah mentions 'Flint Michigan' (meaning the lead in the water) and doesn't seem to realise that everyone in that room has FAILED to do anything for those people. But they all patted themselves on the back at the end, didn't they?

@ggreenwald @Trevornoah mentions 'Flint Michigan' (meaning the lead in the water) and doesn't seem to realise that everyone in that room has FAILED to do anything for those people. But they all patted themselves on the back at the end, didn't they?
